meanings.sent1: Many people have arachnophobias and feel scared when they see a spider.
meanings.sent2: Her arachnophobias made her avoid going into the basement where spiders often lurked.
meanings.sent3: Despite his arachnophobias, he couldn't help but laugh when his friend screamed at the tiny spider.
meanings.sent4: Her arachnophobias were like a dark cloud following her wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobias gripped her heart with icy fingers whenever she spotted a spider.

meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme fear of spiders.
meanings.sent1: The arachnophobias in the group screamed when a spider crawled near them.
meanings.sent2: She became known as the arachnophobias of the family due to her intense fear of spiders.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobias insisted on checking every corner for spiders before going to bed.
meanings.sent4: His arachnophobias were so intense that even a picture of a spider made him shiver.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobias trembled at the mere thought of encountering a spider.
